2.rawvalue:
You get a mini-site with a name like [abc.tiny.hn](http://abc.tiny.hn) which you can use for 3 weeks. Ideal for **twitter** or e-mail your friends a quiz.  

2 weeks not long enough? Tiny site just too tiny? Head over to [Guess Who Built This](guesswhobuiltthis.com) to sign up for the full monty.
